00059 class GContext: public GSystem::GContext {
00060 public:
00062    struct GCRestoreState {
00063       GCRestoreState( GContext& gc ):m_gc( gc ) { 
00064          gc.save();
00065       }
00066       ~GCRestoreState() {
00067          m_gc.restore();
00068       }
00069 
00070       GContext& m_gc;
00071    };
00072 
00073    explicit GContext( Cairo::Surface& surf );
00074    ~GContext();
00076    inline void setColor( const Color& color );
00078    inline void setLineWidth( uint32 width );
00080    inline void setFill( bool state );
00082    inline void setFillColor( const Color& color );
00084    inline void setLineCap( LineCap cap );
00086    inline void setLineJoin( LineJoin join );
00088    inline bool useFill() const { return m_fill; }
00090    inline const Color& getFillColor() const { return m_fillColor; }
00092    inline const Color& getForegroundColor() const { return m_foregroundColor; }
00093    inline uint32 getLineWidth() const;
00095    inline void save();
00097    inline void restore();
00098 
00100    inline cairo_t* getContext() { return m_context; }
00101 
00102 private:
00103    Color m_foregroundColor; 
00104    bool m_fill; 
00105    Color m_fillColor; 
00106    cairo_t* m_context; 
00107 };

00179 class LineDrawing {
00180 public:
00184    LineDrawing( GContext& gc, int32 x, int32 y ):
00185       m_gc( gc.getContext() ) {
00186       cairo_move_to( m_gc, x, y );
00187    }
00188 
00189    ~LineDrawing() {
00190       cairo_stroke( m_gc );
00191    }
00192 
00194    inline void lineTo( int32 x, int32 y ) {
00195       cairo_line_to( m_gc, x, y );
00196    }
00197 
00198 private:
00199    cairo_t* m_gc; 
00200 };

00290 namespace Cairo {
00291 Surface::~Surface() {
00292    cairo_surface_destroy( m_surface );
00293 }
00294 
00295 inline
00296 uint32 Surface::getWidth() const { 
00297    return cairo_image_surface_get_width( const_cast< cairo_surface_t* >
00298                                          ( m_surface ) ); 
00299 }
00300 inline
00301 uint32 Surface::getHeight() const { 
00302    return cairo_image_surface_get_height( const_cast< cairo_surface_t* >
00303                                           ( m_surface ) ); 
00304 }
00305 
00306 inline
00307 cairo_surface_t* Surface::getSurface() { 
00308    return m_surface; 
00309 }

00311 inline
00312 GContext::GContext( Cairo::Surface& surface ):
00313    m_context( cairo_create( surface.getSurface() ) ) {
00314 }
00315 
00316 inline
00317 GContext::~GContext() {
00318    cairo_destroy( m_context );
00319 }
00320 
00321 inline
00322 void GContext::setColor( const Color& col ) {
00323    m_foregroundColor = col;
00324    cairo_set_source_rgb( m_context, 
00325                          col.getRed() / 255.0,
00326                          col.getGreen() / 255.0,
00327                          col.getBlue() / 255.0 );
00328 }
00329 
00330 inline
00331 void GContext::setLineWidth( uint32 width ) {
00332    cairo_set_line_width( m_context, width );
00333 }
00334 
00335 inline uint32 GContext::getLineWidth() const {
00336    return static_cast<uint32>( cairo_get_line_width( m_context ) );
00337 }
00338 
00339 inline
00340 void GContext::setFill( bool state ) {
00341    m_fill = state;
00342 }
00343 
00344 inline
00345 void GContext::setFillColor( const Color& color ) {
00346    m_fillColor = color;
00347 }
00348 
00349 inline
00350 void GContext::setLineCap( LineCap cap ) {
00351    switch ( cap ) {
00352    case LINE_CAP_BUTT:
00353       cairo_set_line_cap( m_context, CAIRO_LINE_CAP_BUTT );
00354       break;
00355    case LINE_CAP_ROUND:
00356       cairo_set_line_cap( m_context, CAIRO_LINE_CAP_ROUND );
00357       break;
00358    case LINE_CAP_SQUARE:
00359       cairo_set_line_cap( m_context, CAIRO_LINE_CAP_SQUARE );
00360       break;
00361    }
00362 }
00363 
00364 inline 
00365 void GContext::setLineJoin( LineJoin join ) {
00366    switch ( join ) {
00367    case LINE_JOIN_MITER:
00368       cairo_set_line_join( m_context, CAIRO_LINE_JOIN_MITER );
00369       break;
00370    case LINE_JOIN_BEVEL:
00371       cairo_set_line_join( m_context, CAIRO_LINE_JOIN_BEVEL );
00372       break;
00373    case LINE_JOIN_ROUND:
00374       cairo_set_line_join( m_context, CAIRO_LINE_JOIN_ROUND );
00375       break;
00376    }
00377 }
00378 
00379 inline
00380 void GContext::save() {
00381    cairo_save( m_context );
00382 }
00383 
00384 inline
00385 void GContext::restore() {
00386    cairo_restore( m_context );
00387 }
